docs.text:
Welcome to CS-Suite Documentation


Cloud Security Suite - One stop tool for auditing the security posture of AWS infrastructure.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Cloud Security Suite - One stop tool for auditing the security posture of AWS infrastructure.
docs.title: Welcome to CS-Suite Documentation

docs.text:
Tool requires few python libraries, and python 2.7 on your box. Dont worry about libraries, we have got it sorted. 


You can either download the tool from github as a zip file or use the following command to clone it into your box. 


git clone https://github.com/SecurityFTW/cs-suite.git
cd cs-suite/
sudo python setup.py




Here is a quick video on how you can install the same:
docs.title: Installation
